title: ‘NFT’ app Sticky kicked out and returned to Apple’s App Store after update
content:
NFT apps have been on Apple’s App Store for a while. Those that remained only allowed the browsing of NFTs – not selling them. While there’s no official guidelines surrounding NFTs on iOS, it is difficult for app developers to know what they can and cannot do. 

more…

The post ‘NFT’ app Sticky kicked out and returned to Apple’s App Store after update appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: 'NFT' app Sticky is back on Apple's App Store following an update that lets users export their NFTs to a public blockchain.
